question_sentence: Which company announced this week that it is laying off 16,000 employees?
evidence: Amazon is laying off 16,000 workers, its second big round of job cuts in three months, as it competes in the race for AI dominance.

question_sentence: Which city in the Midwest has been the focus of a recent surge of federal immigration agents?
evidence: Tensions are high in Minneapolis after weeks of protests and two fatal shootings of US citizens by federal immigration officers.

question_sentence: Which automaker is discontinuing some vehicle models to focus on building robots?
evidence: Tesla said it is ending production of its Model S and Model X vehicles and will instead prioritize building robots and expanding its self-driving "robotaxi" service.

question_sentence: Which country returned two giant pandas to China this week after housing them at a zoo for several years?
evidence: Japan’s last two pandas were returned to China this week in a departure that highlights strained relations between the two countries.

question_sentence: Free solo climber Alex Honnold recently scaled one of the world’s tallest buildings live on Netflix without ropes, safety nets or other equipment. How many stories tall was the building?
evidence: Honnold became the first known climber to free solo Taipei 101, a 101-story skyscraper in Taiwan. He completed the death-defying climb in 92 minutes.

question_sentence: Which two NFL teams will face off in the Super Bowl on February 8?
choices: New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks
Kansas City Chiefs and Buffalo Bills
Los Angeles Rams and San Francisco 49ers
evidence: The Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots will meet at Super Bowl LX after winning their respective conference title games.

question_sentence: Which country may soon face higher tariffs for failing to reach a trade agreement with the US?
evidence: President Donald Trump announced he is raising tariffs on goods from South Korea from 15% to 25% because Seoul has not reached a trade agreement with the US.

question_sentence: Tax-filing season has officially begun. What is the filing deadline for most US taxpayers?
evidence: Most taxpayers have until Wednesday, April 15, to file their return and pay any remaining taxes they owe for last year.

question_sentence: According to new federal data, what is the average life expectancy in the US?
evidence: US life expectancy reached a record high of 79 years in 2024 as deaths from drug overdoses and Covid-19 declined, the CDC said this week.

question_sentence: Which member of the Trump family released a documentary this week?
evidence: First lady Melania Trump and her team secured a $40 million deal with Amazon MGM Studios, plus a blockbuster $35 million marketing budget, to create a documentary.
